thread.title: Full Points If You Can Make Out What Sonam Kapoor Wore To This Wedding
thread.title_full: Full Points If You Can Make Out What Sonam Kapoor Wore To This Wedding

title: Full Points If You Can Make Out What Sonam Kapoor Wore To This Wedding
text:
facebook 
It’s a plane… it’s a bird… nope, it’s Sonam Kapoor pulling off another Anamika Khanna outfit that defies all standards of dressing-up familiarity. For a recent wedding, the actress picked an embroidered number that needs a good long look, from all possible angles, before it can be labelled. So, let’s give this a shot? Cool! 
It’s a one-shoulder asymmetrical dress. 
It’s a sari that doesn’t need to be worn like one. Wait, that fringe detail possibly directs towards the direction of separates. It’s an Anamika Khanna outfit so it is all the above things, if not more. 
We are settling on this – It’s an embroidered one-shoulder democratic number, that deceivingly metamorphoses into a sari, high-fiving fringes, and asymmetry along the way. But, in reality, are separates worn to look like anything you want them to be. 
With that bodice-framing silver jewellery, and bohemian-chic hair, this mind-bender is a masterpiece. namratasoni/via Instagram
